statements: SELECT * FROM AthleteProgressReport;
SELECT athlete_id, training_volume FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT athlete_id, strength_gains FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE training_volume > 500;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE athlete_id = 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(training_volume) AS avg_volume, MAX(strength_gains) AS max_gains FROM AthleteProgressReport;
SELECT athlete_id, date, training_volume, strength_gains FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT athlete_id, date, training_volume FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE training_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE strength_gains >= 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, training_volume FROM AthleteProgressReport WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-15';
SELECT MAX(training_volume), MIN(strength_gains) FROM AthleteProgressReport;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT training_date, training_volume FROM Training_Data WHERE strength_gain > 5 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, training_volume FROM Athletes JOIN Training_Data ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE training_volume >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Athletes JOIN Training_Data ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE athlete_age > 25 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC, training_date DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender, training_volume FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Training_Data ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE training_volume >= 100 ORDER BY athlete_name DESC, training_volume ASC;

SELECT athlete_name, training_volume, strength_gain FROM Athletes LEFT JOIN Training_Data ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE athlete_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC, strength_gain DESC;

SELECT athlete_name, training_date, strength_gain FROM Training_Data RIGHT JOIN Athletes ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY athlete_name DESC, strength_gain ASC;

SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, training_date, strength_gain FROM Athletes JOIN Training_Data ON Athletes.athlete_id = Training_Data.athlete_id WHERE athlete_name LIKE 'A%' AND strength_gain > 50 ORDER BY athlete_age ASC, training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_progress ORDER BY date DESC, athlete_id
SELECT athlete_id, progress_metric FROM athlete_progress WHERE athlete_id = 1
SELECT MAX(strength_metric) FROM strength_gains
SELECT * FROM training_volume WHERE volume_metric > 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT athlete_id, date FROM strength_gains
SELECT * FROM athlete_progress WHERE athlete_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, date, progress_metric FROM athlete_progress WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(volume_metric) AS max_volume FROM training_volume GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING MAX(volume_metric) > 100;
SELECT athlete_id, date, strength_metric FROM strength_gains WHERE strength_metric > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(strength_metric) AS avg_strength FROM strength_gains GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING AVG(strength_metric) > 70;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, age, height FROM Athletes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, gender, weight FROM Athletes WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT athlete_name, workout_date, workout_type FROM Workouts WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT athlete_name, muscle_group, weight_lifted FROM Athletes JOIN StrengthGains ON Athletes.athlete_id = StrengthGains.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_name, age, weight FROM Athletes WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT athlete_name, workout_date, workout_type, duration_minutes FROM Athletes JOIN Workouts ON Athletes.athlete_id = Workouts.athlete_id WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY workout_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT athlete_id, workout_id, muscle_group, weight_lifted FROM StrengthGains WHERE rep_count >= 10 ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC, rep_count ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT athlete_name, report_date, report_type, report_text FROM Athletes JOIN Reports ON Athletes.athlete_id = Reports.athlete_id WHERE report_type LIKE '%Physical%' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Workouts ORDER BY workout_date DESC, athlete_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT id, name, age FROM athletes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, report_date, progress_percentage FROM progress_reports WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT coach_name, specialization, experience_years FROM coach_info;
SELECT * FROM training_volume WHERE intensity_level = 3 ORDER BY total_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, height, weight FROM athletes ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, count(volume_id) AS num_training_sessions FROM training_volume GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING num_training_sessions > 5;
SELECT athletes.name, strength_gains.muscle_group FROM athletes INNER JOIN strength_gains ON athletes.id = strength_gains.athlete_id WHERE athletes.age < 30;
SELECT coach_name, specialization, experience_years FROM coach_info WHERE experience_years >= 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
